This is for a 1911 T201 Mecca Double Folder featuring Ty Cobb/Sam Crawford. This card does have tape holding the two pieces together.   $125.00 Paypal preferred, money order, and check are accepted. Please add $4.80 for USPS priority shipping. E-mail with any questions. aaroncerin@aol.com 

Thanks for looking.
